properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued March 1 at 2:16PM PST until March 2 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...Around 6 to 8 ft, but easing to 6 ft by Sunday
night.

- FIRST EBB...Around 9 PM Sun. Seas to 8 ft with breakers
possible.

- SECOND EBB...Around 930 AM Mon. Seas to 10 ft with breakers
likely.

- THIRD EBB...Around 10 PM Mon. Seas to 9 ft.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 AM PST MONDAY
